FEBRUARY 2nd, 2019, NEW DELHI

AI for Computational Social Science

It's a tag line, where you can write a key point of your idea. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

The AI for Computational Social Science seminar is a one-day gathering of some of the most influential people in the field of Computationsl Social Science, which covers areas like Data Mining, Complex Networks, Social Computing, Natural Language Processing and Data-driven Cybersecurity

It is being organized by the Laboratory for Computational Social Science (LCS2) at IIIT Delhi, a research group led by Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty.

IIIT Delhi
Okhla Industrial Estate, Phase III
Near Govind Puri Metro Station
New Delhi, Delhi 110020
